name: Ratta Tat Tat
description:
You are a rat just trying to get some cheese and bring it back to your home. The rat the brings the most cheese back to his home wins. 

Controls are:

  • A: Left
  • D: Right
  • Or click and drag to move. 
  • You are always running. 

It is best if you have someone else playing at the same time.
